hero.title: Pediatric Basic Life Support (PBLS)
hero.description: Pediatric Basic Life Support (PBLS) is the essential guideline for rescuing infants and children in cardiac or respiratory arrest. This platform provides systematic training combining theory, process flow, and scenario simulations.

fire.title: Fire Inhalation Injury Treatment Measures
steps: Perform endotracheal intubation and provide oxygen

trauma.title: Trauma Treatment Measures
steps: Perform hemostasis and establish IV access

virtualHumanSection.title: Virtual Human Interaction

quiz.title: Written Test
quiz.description: 20 multiple choice questions, 5 seconds per question. Please make the most of your precious first aid time and respond correctly.
